name: Late Shift
description: Late Shift is a high stakes FMV crime thriller. Forced into a brutal London heist, you must choose your own path in this interactive cinematic experience with adaptable storylines that lead to one of seven conclusions. Your decisions are you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD Radeon HD 5750. OpenGL 3.3 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 64-bit Processor: Quad Core 2.3GHz or equivalent processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compliant video card with 2GB RAM (NVidia GeForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon HD 7850) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7500 MB available space
